content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (-10.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-10.0, -50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -48.5) transferring items to the furnace
- Wooden Chest at position (-8.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-7.5, -49.5) transferring items from the chest
- Burner Inserter at position (-5.5, -49.5) transferring items from the belt to the chest

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with 4 belts connecting positions (x=-15.5 y=-54.5) to (x=-10.5 y=-54.5)
- BeltGroup with 13 belts connecting positions (x=-21.5 y=-51.5) to (x=-15.5 y=-53.5)
- BeltGroup with 10 belts connecting positions (x=-14.5 y=-50.5) to (x=-14.5 y=-55.5)
- Additional Belt connecting positions (x=-9.5 y=-53.5) to (x=-9.5 y=-55.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure that the chest contains the specified item before attempting to extract.

### Errors when finding or using mining drills
- Verify the presence and position of mining drills before attempting operations.
- Ensure there is no obstruction at the target location before placing a mining drill.

### Errors when connecting belts directly to chests
- Use an inserter to connect belts to chests instead of attempting a direct connection.

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check that the target tile is unoccupied before placing an entity to avoid placement errors.
